list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small body of still water formed naturally or by hollowing or embanking.
hold back or dam up (flowing water or another liquid) to form a small lake.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the lava can't flow away and gets ponded up in the crater
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Lava không thể chảy trốn và bị ao ao trong miệng núi lửa
